content.description: Stand start with two crimps six feet off the deck.  From there, move up the slab using thin feet and hands to reach a solid topout.  Finding the correct sequence is important.
content.protection: A few pads and a spot, landing is pretty good though.
content.location: This is in the center-right section of Teri's Slab, use the picture for reference.  It climbs the noticeably dark brown colored streak on the boulder's right half.

content.description: Climb crimps, use good footwork, and move up the left side of the east face of Teri's Slab.
content.protection: Pads and spotter or there is the ability to top rope it if you've got the gear.
content.location: The climb is located on the left side of the east face on Teri's Slab. There's an obvious downclimb on the north side of the boulder.

content.description: Start near the middle of Teri's Slab and move up and slightly right. The crux is near the top.
content.protection: Pads, spotter, or a top rope set up if you want it.
content.location:
This is located nearly right in the middle of the east side of Teri's Slab. There's an obvious walk off on the north side of the boulder.

To get there, walk down the main dirt road in the Rock Garden. After passing Broken Boulder on the left, there's a faint trail that heads left. Walk down the path to find Teri's Slab. You can see the top tip of it from the main dirt road.
